title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Systematic Strategy Workshop for Instructional Design Practical Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can systematically develop language education curricula following the instructional design process.
Learners can collaborate with diverse stakeholders (instructors, learners) to derive design requirements.
Learners can enhance the effectiveness of educational content by 20% or more by applying evidence-based design strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
